about_the_game:
"Finally, an overpriced DLC that does nothing but add a clown nose to the main character". Outcore: Clown Nose Supporter Pack is the DLC you never asked for, yet exists any way for some reason.

Play the game the way it was always intended, as a clown who decided to pay for a game that is free!
  • Discover Lumi's true form: the same form as the base game, but she also has a clown nose.
  • Experience like 5 lines or less of new clown-nose-related dialogue.
  • Read a bullet point list that is longer than it should be.
  • That's it.

(This DLC barely adds any content at all, you should probably only buy it if you wish to support the game)
